name: Zombie Sniper Training 2015: American Special Forces Soldier 3D
name_original: Zombie Sniper Training 2015: American Special Forces Soldier 3D
description:
Here you find the professional 3D first person shooting sniper game, with bullets perfectly aiming targets in slow motion.
If you do not like violence or you are afraid of blood, zombies and graves do not install this game.
If you want to become Professional Sniper and National Hero when the real apocalypse begins you surely should.
When that time will come and zombies will come out from graves you would be the one who will shoot them with great precision. Stay brave and be focused my Man.


Credits:
